title: Bark Park & Dog Wash Station, Cable and Wi-Fi ready, Clubhouse
posting_body: ['Save Up to $1000 on Select 1 & 2 Bedrooms!', 'Welcome to The Avondale', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 2', 'OR Text', '2', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1125 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Our community offers newly remodeled apartment homes with features like full-size washers and dryers, upgraded blinds and valances, solid oak cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and walk-in closets.', "From the kitchen to the bathroom, we've added details that make living at The Avondale a luxury experience.", 'The Avondale Apartments are a pet-friendly community has a three resort-style swimming pools, a large fitness center, barbecue areas throughout the property and easy access to 3+ miles of jogging trails.', 'We are conveniently located within Peccole Ranch and are near Summerlin Parkway, I-95 and the 215 Beltway for an easy commute.', 'Features:', 'Washer & Dryer in Unit, Walk-In closets, Cable and Wi-Fi ready, Stainless Steel Appliances, Fire places in every apartment', 'Community Amenities:', 'Yoga & TRX Studio, BBQ Areas, Recreation Area, Clubhouse, (3) Resort Style Swimming Pools, Beautiful Landscaping, Online Maintenance Requests, Bark Park & Dog Wash Station, Professional Management, Amazon Package Lockers, Gated Access, Flexible Lease Terms Available, 24hr Emergency Maintenance', 'Pet Policy', 'No weight restrictions', 'Breed restrictions do apply', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', '1wudiZURD']
